entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
